mapper.update: UPDATE report_mon_overproof SET occurDate = #{occurDate}, cod = #{cod}, nhh = #{nhh}, tp = #{tp}, tn = #{tn}, ss = #{ss}, ph = #{ph}, type = #{type}, monthReportId = #{monthReportId}, logRemarks = #{logRemarks}, logRecorder = #{logRecorder}, update_date = #{updateDate} WHERE id = #{id}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO report_mon_overproof( occurDate, cod, nhh, tp, tn, ss, ph, type, monthReportId, CREATE_BY, CREATE_DATE, UPDATE_BY, UPDATE_DATE, REMARKS, DEL_FLAG ) VALUES ( #{occurDate}, #{cod}, #{nhh}, #{tp}, #{tn}, #{ss}, #{ph}, #{type}, #{monthReportId}, #{createBy.id}, #{createDate}, #{updateBy.id}, #{updateDate}, #{remarks}, #{delFlag} )
